dublinCore.dc:title: 113 S2154 IS: Emergency Medical Services for Children Reauthorization Act of 2014
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

form.current-chamber: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

action.action-desc: Mr. Casey (for himself and Mr. Hatch) introduced the following bill; which was read twice and referred to the Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions

form.official-title: To amend the Public Health Service Act to reauthorize the Emergency Medical Services for Children Program.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Emergency Medical Services for Children Reauthorization Act of 2014.
Section 1910(d) of the Public Health Service Act (42 U.S.C. 300wâ€“9(d)) is amended by striking fiscal year 2014 and inserting each of fiscal years 2015 through 2019.
